summary: Consume Drift API to perform operations on contacts such as creating, updating, getting, and deleting.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Select the type of authentication to use (Access Token or OAuth2).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to perform operations on (Contact or Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the selected resource (Create, Get, Update, Delete, etc.).

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating a contact (e.g., Name, Phone).

parameters.name: updateFields
parameters.description: Fields to update for a contact (e.g., Email, Name, Phone).
